entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 94 %

Wind: ENE 10 km/h

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Rain or snow at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm except snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain or snow at times heavy changing to snow at times heavy overnight. Local blowing snow. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm except snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 early in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
